translation.en: So she understands herself...
translation.zh: 那样她才能更懂自己…

translation.en: knows how to handle it.
translation.zh: 知道怎样处理

translation.en: What are you saying?
translation.zh: 你在说什么？

translation.en: She may have to be on some types of drugs all her life.
translation.zh: 她可能一生毒品就没间断过

translation.en: She is. We are.
translation.zh: 她是啊 我们也是啊

translation.en: Well, there's nothing wrong with that.
translation.zh: 这样也没什么不对啊

translation.en: I've been taking psychotropics since I can... remember.
translation.zh: 从我记事开始我就一直服用精神药物

translation.en: Do you see anything wrong with it, if you have a problem?
translation.zh: 你觉得有什么问题吗？你有什么不满吗？

translation.en: -It's no more than having-- -I could understand one or two people
translation.zh: -只不过是…-我能理解有那么一、两个

translation.en: being throwed off, but the whole damn family? Come on now.
translation.zh: 害群之马 但是整个家族？你可别胡扯了

translation.en: [Warren] The fruit does not fall too far from the tree.
translation.zh: 落叶归根的 有其母必有其女

translation.en: I think that my mother probably should have had a hysterectomy when she was 16.
translation.zh: 我想 我妈妈真应该在16岁时做子宫切除

translation.en: Now, I really think that
translation.zh: 现在我真的这样想

translation.en: because, see, if I had been as educated then as I am now,
translation.zh: 因为如果我那个时候有现在的阅历和知识

translation.en: I probably would not have had my children
translation.zh: 我可能就不会生孩子

translation.en: and put them through what they have gone through.
translation.zh: 让他们去经历那些 他们经历的苦难

translation.en: And I think a lot of it is genetics.
translation.zh: 我觉得很大的因素是遗传的

translation.en: This family probably needs therapy more than-- You know, to bring it closer.
translation.zh: 这个家族可能需要心理咨询才能更紧密亲近

translation.en: [Mitchell] I'm not gonna sit in no room with all of my family.
translation.zh: 我才不会和我所有的家人坐在一个房间里

translation.en: I can't do it. I won't even go to--
translation.zh: 我做不到 我都没办法去…

translation.en: I do one-on-one.
translation.zh: 我可以一对一聊

translation.en: I'm not gonna sit-- A group of crazy people cannot tell me
translation.zh: 我才不会坐在那里… 不能让一群疯子告诉我我身上有什么问题

translation.en: -what the hell is wrong with me. -[chuckling]
translation.zh: 不能让一群疯子告诉我我身上有什么问题

translation.en: [man] Patsy Cottrell, who was a court of appeals judge in Tennessee
translation.zh: 帕西·科特里尔是田纳西州一名上诉法院法官

translation.en: and the widow of Ross Alderman,
translation.zh: 罗斯·奥德曼的遗孀

translation.en: who was the public defender in Nashville at the time Cyntoia was first charged,
translation.zh: 罗斯是辛托娅第一次被控诉时纳什维尔市的公共辩护律师

translation.en: called me to say that this documentary was gonna be shown at the Green Hills theater
translation.zh: 给我打电话说这个纪录片要在绿山剧场

translation.en: as a part of the film festival.
translation.zh: 作为电影节的一个环节播放

translation.en: So I went on a Saturday afternoon, I think, in April of 2010
translation.zh: 我在一个周六的下午去了应该是2010年四月

translation.en: to see the documentary, and it was amazing.
translation.zh: 我去看了那个纪录片 真的很不错

translation.en: That story moved me because you could just--
translation.zh: 这个故事打动了我因为明显能够看到…

translation.en: You could see that this young woman didn't get a fair shake.
translation.zh: 能够看到这位女青年没有得到公平的待遇

translation.en: There was more to this story than the courts knew at the time.
translation.zh: 这个故事的背后有着更多不被法庭知道的秘密

translation.en: So I reached out to my best friend, Houston Gordon.
translation.zh: 所以我就联系了我最好的朋友休斯顿·戈尔登

translation.en: [Gordon] I had not seen the documentary at that time,
translation.zh: 我那个时候还没看过那部纪录片

translation.en: but he had it to take home and look at.
translation.zh: 但他让我带回家看

translation.en: He told me about the alcohol abuse of her mother.
translation.zh: 他告诉我被告母亲的酗酒状况

translation.en: In fact, Dan Birman's interview with Georgina Mitchell, Cyntoia's mother,
translation.zh: 其实丹·波尔曼给辛托娅的生母乔吉娜·米歇尔采访的时候

translation.en: gave the history of the alcohol abuse.
translation.zh: 说出了她有酗酒史的事情

translation.en: Here's a kid who didn't have a chance.
translation.zh: 她只是一个没有机会的孩子

translation.en: She didn't have a chance before she was born.
translation.zh: 在出生之前 她没有机会…

translation.en: She didn't have a chance after she was born.
translation.zh: 出生之后还是没有机会

translation.en: And that affected her all the way from the transfer hearing
translation.zh: 这一直影响着她 从转移听审

translation.en: all the way through, quite frankly, to the present.
translation.zh: 说实话 一直到现在 依然影响着她

translation.en: Once she was convicted of those crimes,
translation.zh: 一旦她被判定犯下了这些罪行

translation.en: it was 51 years before she's eligible for parole, 60-year sentence.
translation.zh: 就要51年后才能有资格保释60年的有期徒刑

translation.en: [Bone] We spent a lot of time and money
translation.zh: 我们花了很多时间和金钱

translation.en: to find the very best experts on the fetal alcohol syndrome
translation.zh: 去找最好的胎儿酒精综合症专家

translation.en: who could come and evaluate Cyntoia specifically
translation.zh: 可以专门过来评估辛托娅

translation.en: and talk about the science of the brain.
translation.zh: 讲讲大脑的科学

translation.en: She still has that...
translation.zh: 她依然有那种…

translation.en: -impulsive... -She does. ...piece that really worries me that, you know...
translation.zh: -冲动的一面 让我非常担忧…-确实

translation.en: We developed a plan to take this back to the criminal court in Davidson County
translation.zh: 我们计划把这个带回戴维森县的刑事法庭

translation.en: and to ask for post-conviction relief and to present our case.
translation.zh: 请求审判后的上诉减刑展示我们的案子

translation.en: When you look at all this, was it a fundamentally fair trial?
translation.zh: 当你去看这一切这是一次基本公正的审判吗？

translation.en: And, you know, of course, I'm passionate about it,
translation.zh: 当然了 我对这个案子很有热情

translation.en: and we believe that we have a good chance of convincing the Court of just that.
translation.zh: 我们相信 我们有很大的机会能让法庭相信这一点

translation.en: [Cyntoia] I've questioned out loud, how am I gonna do this?
translation.zh: 我曾大声地扪心自问我要怎么去完成这次上诉？

translation.en: How am I supposed to do this time?
translation.zh: 我这次要怎么做？

translation.en: Am I supposed to spend the rest of my life in prison?
translation.zh: 我的余生都要在监狱里度过吗？

translation.en: 'Cause it hurts. I want to go home, and I can't.
translation.zh: 因为我很痛苦 我想回家 但我不能回

translation.en: My 22nd birthday was kind of hard because I looked at it like
translation.zh: 我22岁生日很难过 因为我会这样想

translation.en: I was supposed to be graduating college, but I'm in here.
translation.zh: 这本来应该是大学毕业的年纪而我却在这里

translation.en: It's made me stronger. It's made me wiser, more resilient at times.
translation.zh: 它让我更强大、更明智有的时候更有适应能力

translation.en: I'm actually going to college. Surprise!
translation.zh: 我真的要去大学了 惊喜吧！

translation.en: [Gordon] How are you?
translation.zh: 你好吗？

translation.en: -Good. How are you? -I'm okay.
translation.zh: -很好 谢谢你-我很好

translation.en: [Cyntoia] Lipscomb University, they come out, and they hold class here once a week.
translation.zh: 利普斯康大学每周都会到这里来举办一次课程

translation.en: And yeah, we get to obtain an associate's degree in Letters, Arts and Sciences.
translation.zh: 我们能获得文学、艺术和科学的副学士学位

translation.en: That's what I'm doing right now. That's what my life focus is on right now.
translation.zh: 我现在正在努力获得这也是我目前人生的重心

translation.en: I'm also still trying to get back in court and work on my case and stuff.
translation.zh: 同时我还在努力回法庭处理我的案子相关的事情

translation.en: [Gordon] This is a case that, not only would make a difference
translation.zh: 如果本案能出现好的结果

translation.en: hopefully for Cyntoia, but may make a difference
translation.zh: 不止会给辛托娅的人生带来转机

translation.en: for these thousands upon thousands of children
translation.zh: 也会让成千上万的

translation.en: who are born in situations that they can't control.
translation.zh: 无法控制自己出生环境的孩子们带来转机

translation.en: [Wyatt] Good morning to everyone.
translation.zh: 大家早上好

translation.en: We're ready to get started on the hearing, and good morning to all the lawyers here.
translation.zh: 我们已经准备好开始今天的听审对几位律师说一句早上好

translation.en: -[man] Good morning. -[Wyatt] Mr. Gordon.
translation.zh: -早上好-戈登先生

translation.en: -Mr. Charles Bone, go right ahead. -[Bone] Thank you.
translation.zh: -查尔斯·伯恩先生 继续-谢谢

translation.en: I'm here with Mr. Bruno and Mr. Gordon,
translation.zh: 我今天和布鲁诺先生还有戈登先生一起

translation.en: and we're pro bono counsel for Cyntoia Brown.
translation.zh: 我们是辛托娅·布朗的免费律师咨询团

translation.en: We intend to show to the Court today
translation.zh: 我们今天打算向法庭展示

translation.en: that Ms. Brown's sentence that was received in this court in 2006
translation.zh: 布朗女士2006年在本法庭获得的审判

translation.en: is the functional equivalent of a life sentence without parole.
translation.zh: 基本等同于终生监禁 不得保释

translation.en: Your Honor will have the opportunity to hear
translation.zh: 庭上将有机会听到

translation.en: the first really extensive discussion and diagnosis
translation.zh: 对患有胎儿酒精综合症的田纳西州青少年罪犯

translation.en: of a Tennessee juvenile with fetal alcohol spectrum disorder, FASD.
translation.zh: 第一次详尽的讨论和诊断

translation.en: Unfortunately, the content for the presentation of this information
translation.zh: 不幸的是 即将展示的信息内容

translation.en: and these findings must come in the context that Cyntoia suffered
translation.zh: 这些发现必须要结合辛托娅的背景

translation.en: also from the ineffective assistance from counsel.
translation.zh: 她没有得到律师的有效协助

translation.en: And at the conclusion of the hearing, we believe Your Honor will find
translation.zh: 在本次听审结束时我们相信庭上会认为

translation.en: by clear and convincing determination
translation.zh: 我们有清晰、令人信服的理由决定

translation.en: that Cyntoia Brown deserves a new trial.
translation.zh: 辛托娅·布朗案应该重新审理

translation.en: As the Court knows, probably recalls,
translation.zh: 本庭可能还会记得

translation.en: I was assigned to juvenile court at the time this took place.
translation.zh: 本案最开始我被指派到少年法庭

translation.en: I did the transfer hearing in this case.
translation.zh: 参与了本案的转移听审

translation.en: I have known this case for eight years now.
translation.zh: 我对本案的了解已有八年之久

translation.en: This evidence of fetal alcohol syndrome that's about to be presented to the Court,
translation.zh: 即将呈现给本庭的这个胎儿酒精综合症的证据

translation.en: I would ask the Court to look closely at its reliability
translation.zh: 我希望本庭能密切关注这些证据的可信性

translation.en: and whether it would have been admissible in the trial if shown.
translation.zh: 自案审中展示出来 是否可以采信

translation.en: The bottom line is that the allegation here is that Rich McGee and Wendy Tucker,
translation.zh: 还有一个基本问题是这是毫无证据的说法 里奇·麦基和温蒂·塔克二位律师一直闻名于法院

translation.en: two attorneys very well known to the Court,
translation.zh: 里奇·麦基和温蒂·塔克二位律师一直闻名于法院

translation.en: were ineffective in not presenting evidence.
translation.zh: 呈给法院无效证据

translation.en: We will contend that it is impossible to show that there was a deficiency
translation.zh: 我方主张 律师在代表被告时

translation.en: in the representation she received, or that, if there were, it would--
translation.zh: 不可能找出任何瑕疵或者如果真的有

translation.en: The lack of it would have resulted in a different outcome.
translation.zh: 这个瑕疵 将会产生完全不同的结果

translation.en: [Bruno] Ms. Tucker, at the time of your representation of Ms. Brown,
translation.zh: 塔克女士 你在代表布朗女士的时候

translation.en: were you familiar with the disease of fetal alcohol spectrum disorder?
translation.zh: 是否熟悉胎儿酒精综合症？

translation.en: Had you ever heard of that or knew anything about that?
translation.zh: 你是否听说过这种病症或对其有所了解？

translation.en: I am sure I had heard of it.
translation.zh: 我相信 我有听说过

translation.en: I know I've never presented a defense regarding fetal alcohol syndrome.
translation.zh: 我知道我未曾就胎儿酒精综合症提起过辩护

translation.en: I don't know if I ever had any clients
translation.zh: 我不确定我以前是否有客户患这种病

translation.en: where it was something in their records or not, but I'm sure I'd heard of it.
translation.zh: 是否在医疗记录中但我确定我听说过

translation.en: I became much more familiar with it after Mr. Birman interviewed some people.
translation.zh: 波尔曼先生采访了一些人后我对这种病更熟悉了

translation.en: [Bruno] Did you seek the assistance of any medical expert
translation.zh: 你是否有在当地寻求过胎儿酒精综合症

translation.en: in the area of fetal alcohol spectrum disorder?
translation.zh: 医疗专家的帮助？

translation.en: [Tucker] I did not.
translation.zh: 我没有

translation.en: [Burks] Now, you were asked about fetal alcohol syndrome.
translation.zh: 你被问到过胎儿酒精综合症的事情

translation.en: [Tucker] Right.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Was that something you'd ever heard of at this time?
translation.zh: 这时 你有听说过这个病症吗？

translation.en: [Tucker] I'm sure I'd heard of it at the time.
translation.zh: 我确信当时我是听说过的

translation.en: [Burks] Was it something that Dr. Bernet ever mentioned to your memory?
translation.zh: 在你的记忆中这是博内特医生提到过的吗？

translation.en: [Tucker] Not to my memory, no.
translation.zh: 在我的记忆中 不是

translation.en: Had a mental health professional mentioned it to you,
translation.zh: 公平地讲如果精神健康专家对你提起过

translation.en: you would have looked into it, fair to say.
translation.zh: 你就会深入研究这个问题

translation.en: Yes, I hope so.
translation.zh: 是的 我希望如此

translation.en: I wish they had. I wish I had.
translation.zh: 希望他们曾提到过希望我有深入研究过

translation.en: [Gordon] What is fetal alcohol spectrum disorder?
translation.zh: 胎儿酒精综合症是什么？

translation.en: Fetal alcohol spectrum disorder is referred to as an umbrella term,
translation.zh: 胎儿酒精综合症是一个统称

translation.en: and they all relate to the fact that alcohol is a particularly heinous poison
translation.zh: 各种症状都显示 酒精对胎儿的发育

translation.en: to the developing fetus.
translation.zh: 格外地有害

translation.en: Tell the Court, if you would,
translation.zh: 请告诉本庭

translation.en: what the effect in general would be on a fetus
translation.zh: 如果一个胎儿的母亲

translation.en: whose mother was drinking
translation.zh: 像乔吉娜·米歇尔所描述的那样

translation.en: the way that Georgina Mitchell has testified she was drinking.
translation.zh: 在怀孕期间严重酗酒通常会产生怎样的影响？

translation.en: [Adler] Alcohol is considered
translation.zh: 酒精被认为

translation.en: one of the worst toxins, one of the worst poisons.
translation.zh: 是最剧烈的毒药 毒害胎儿

translation.en: The brain is the organ that's most negatively affected.
translation.zh: 大脑是受到消极影响最严重的器官

translation.en: [Gordon] Did you make an examination
translation.zh: 你是否有对辛托娅·布朗

translation.en: -and evaluation of Cyntoia Brown? -[Adler] Yes.
translation.zh: -进行测试和评估？-是

translation.en: [Gordon] When did you do that?
translation.zh: 是什么时候做的？

translation.en: [Adler] June the 24th of 2011.
What conclusion, if any, did you come to as to whether she had had brain damage?
translation.zh: 她是否有大脑损伤你评估后得出了怎样的结论？

translation.en: [Adler] Simply, Ms. Brown has alcohol-related neurodevelopmental disorder,
translation.zh: 简单来讲 布朗女士有酒精导致的神经发育障碍

translation.en: -and I would like to explain if I could. -[Gordon] Please.
translation.zh: -如果法官允许我展开 我愿详细说明-请讲

translation.en: So she is seriously impaired.
translation.zh: 她的大脑严重受损

translation.en: If you just look at her cognitive or neuropsychological testing alone,
translation.zh: 如果单独看她的认知测试或者神经心理学测试

translation.en: the discrepancy between her tested IQ
translation.zh: 她的智商检测结果和其他能力之间的差异

translation.en: and her other abilities is really remarkable.
translation.zh: 非常让人震惊

translation.en: She does not function like a person.
translation.zh: 她的大脑反应无法匹敌正常人

translation.en: Her functional abilities are terrible.
translation.zh: 她的功能性能力非常差

translation.en: So terrible, they are equivalent to a person with mild mental retardation,
translation.zh: 差到基本等同于有轻度智障的人

translation.en: and that is not inconsequential.
translation.zh: 这不是微不足道的差距

translation.en: It's known that persons with fetal alcohol spectrum disorders
translation.zh: 据研究 患有胎儿酒精综合症的人

translation.en: have a markedly higher rate of problems with the law.
translation.zh: 犯法的概率显著增高

translation.en: [Gordon] Was she suffering that at the time of August 2004, at the time of this incident?
translation.zh: 她犯案的时候 2004年8月是否患有此病？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: [Gordon] Was she suffering from it before then? [Adler] Yes.
translation.zh: -她是否在此前就已患有此病？-是的

translation.en: -[Gordon] Is she suffering from that now? -Yes.
translation.zh: -她现在是否依然患有此病？-是的

translation.en: [Gordon] Is that something she's going to suffer the rest of her life?
translation.zh: 她是否会终生患有此疾病？

translation.en: More or less, yes.
translation.zh: 基本会是这样 是的

translation.en: [Gordon] Thank you, Your Honor.
translation.zh: 谢谢庭上

translation.en: We appreciate the opportunity to bring these issues before the Court.
translation.zh: 我们感激庭上愿意给我们机会在本庭面前提出这些问题

translation.en: What is the clear and convincing evidence here?
translation.zh: 那么这其中明确而令人信服的证据是什么呢？

translation.en: I believe that's our burden. The clear and convincing evidence is
translation.zh: 我相信就是我们的负担明确而令人信服的证据就是

translation.en: she has this brain damage.
translation.zh: 她有大脑损伤

translation.en: She had it because her mother admittedly abused alcohol
translation.zh: 之所以有大脑损伤是因为她母亲也承认

translation.en: the entire time she was carrying the baby.
translation.zh: 在怀她的整个期间大量酗酒

translation.en: That brain damage has caused her to not be able to control herself,
translation.zh: 这种大脑损伤让她无法控制自己

translation.en: and when she sees chaos, not respond to it adequately.
translation.zh: 当她看到混乱的场景时无法正确地做出反应

translation.en: I appreciate the Court's attention, and I respectfully ask
translation.zh: 我感谢本庭认真听取 并殷切地希望

translation.en: that, when we submit our proposals to you, I know the Court will do justice.
translation.zh: 我们提交此建议后本庭一定会予以公正地考虑

translation.en: [Burks] A number of things I want to point out to the Court briefly
translation.zh: 关于本庭刚刚听到的证据

translation.en: about the evidence the Court has heard.
translation.zh: 我想明确指出几点疑问

translation.en: Number one, much of the basis of what the Court's heard came
translation.zh: 第一 本庭刚刚听到的证据其中大部分

translation.en: from the defendant's mother
translation.zh: 来自于被告的母亲

translation.en: who is an inmate in a federal prison.
translation.zh: 这位母亲曾是联邦监狱的囚犯

translation.en: Her assertions about what she did when she was pregnant with Ms. Brown
translation.zh: 她说自己怀布朗女士的时候做了什么事情 是她的片面之词

translation.en: could never be proven or disproven.
translation.zh: 永远无法证明真假

translation.en: It would be argued to a jury by any competent state's attorney
translation.zh: 任何称职的州检察官都会在这种情况下对陪审团争辩

translation.en: that these diagnoses by the scientists seem to explain away
translation.zh: 这些科学家给出的诊断结果似乎可以为布朗女士

translation.en: any bad behavior on the part of Ms. Brown
translation.zh: 所做出的任何不良行为脱罪

translation.en: in her past or in this particular incident.
translation.zh: 不论是过去的行为还是本案中的行为

translation.en: A jury trial is not about giving the jury
translation.zh: 陪审团审理不是要给陪审团呈现

translation.en: a full and complete picture of the defendant's mental makeup.
translation.zh: 被告完整的精神状态组成

translation.en: The jury trial is about whether the state has
translation.zh: 陪审团审理是本州是否有

translation.en: proof beyond a reasonable doubt on the essential elements.
translation.zh: 陪审团审理是本州是否有 合理质疑之上的 对基本要素的证明

translation.en: [Wyatt] Thank you. All right. The transcripts will be available
translation.zh: 谢谢 今天的法庭记录将在

translation.en: -the first Monday in December. -[Gordon] Thank you.
translation.zh: -12月的第一个星期一用文字整理好-谢谢

translation.en: And then how long did you want to prepare your memorandum or whatever it is?
translation.zh: 你准备报告等资料需要多久？

translation.en: -[Gordon] Fifteen days. -That's fine too.
translation.zh: -十五天-可以

translation.en: What about Friday the 14th of December? Is that enough time?
translation.zh: 12月14日怎么样？时间够用吗？

translation.en: And then I'll take it under advisement,
translation.zh: 然后我会仔细阅读 认真考虑

translation.en: and then sometime several weeks after that, I'll reach a decision.
translation.zh: 之后我会给出一个决议

translation.en: That's it. We'll close the court. Court is adjourned.
translation.zh: 那就这样 本庭关闭 休庭

translation.en: [Gordon] Post-conviction relief, the appeal of her conviction,
translation.zh: 裁决后上诉减刑 已经定罪再上诉

translation.en: is a very limited opportunity for relief.
translation.zh: 能够减刑的机会非常有限

translation.en: The judge acknowledged that she did have alcohol-related disorder.
translation.zh: 法官认可她有酒精造成的精神失调

translation.en: We proved that she could not control her impulses.
translation.zh: 我们证明了 她无法控制自己的冲动

translation.en: [Cyntoia] I can tell you all kinds of stuff about a long time ago,
translation.zh: 我可以给你讲我很久之前的事

translation.en: but you can tell me right now, "Cyntoia, don't do this.
translation.zh: 但如果现在你告诉我“辛托娅 你千万不要做这件事”

translation.en: Make sure you don't do this." I'll say, "I know, I know. I got you."
translation.zh: 但如果现在你告诉我“辛托娅 你千万不要做这件事” 我会说“好的 我知道了”

translation.en: And, like, two seconds later, I'll do it.
translation.zh: 然后 两秒之后 我就会做

translation.en: I mean, I don't know. It makes me look at myself different a little.
translation.zh: 我也不知道或许我这样 是跟别人有些不同

translation.en: [Gordon] You have to show that no reasonable jury
translation.zh: 如果要更改法庭的宣判你必须要证明

translation.en: would have found her guilty if that legal error had been corrected.
translation.zh: 如果要更改法庭的宣判你必须要证明 陪审团无法找到合理的理由认定她有罪

translation.en: It's a pretty steep hill to climb.
translation.zh: 这要攀爬一个异常艰难、陡峭的高峰

translation.en: And so he denied the relief.
translation.zh: 所以他拒绝了减刑

translation.en: [Cyntoia] I'm having trouble reconciling that.
translation.zh: 我很难安心

translation.en: So what does that mean? I don't-- I don't get it.
translation.zh: 这是什么意思？我无法理解

translation.en: And it's-- It pisses me off.
translation.zh: 这让我很生气

translation.en: I mean, my life is gonna continue.
translation.zh: 我的人生还要继续

translation.en: I'm not gonna stop just because what they said,
translation.zh: 不会因为他们说了什么 我就会停止

translation.en: but I mean, I'll remember it.
translation.zh: 但我会记住

translation.en: [Warren] There's a lot of sadness and lies and pain
translation.zh: 很伤心 很多谎言 很痛苦

translation.en: and not knowing what to do about any of it.
translation.zh: 而且还不知道怎样解决这些问题

translation.en: What can we do?
translation.zh: 我们能做什么？

translation.en: You know the sadness of Toia's eyes.
translation.zh: 你们知道托娅眼中的那种悲伤

translation.en: It came from genetics, and the genetics should stop.
translation.zh: 那是遗传的 这种遗传应该停止了

translation.en: My life has been so horrible.
translation.zh: 我的一生太可怕了

translation.en: The rapes, the beatings.
translation.zh: 强奸、殴打

translation.en: I was a victim of that type of person.
translation.zh: 对那种人 我深受其害

translation.en: Tommy came to my house, and during the time that I was washing dishes,
translation.zh: 托米来到我家 在我洗完的时候

translation.en: he grabbed me and snatched me and started beating me and drug me to the bedroom.
translation.zh: 他抓住我 一把扯过去 开始殴打我把我拖到卧室

translation.en: And he says,
translation.zh: 然后他说

translation.en: "You're gonna get what you deserve."
translation.zh: “不论你发生了什么 都是你活该”

translation.en: And then... and then came... came the rape.
translation.zh: 然后他就开始强奸

translation.en: I just lay there, and I cried.
translation.zh: 我只能躺在那里哭

translation.en: And I pulled myself together, put on makeup.
translation.zh: 然后我打起精神 开始化妆

translation.en: That's what abused families usually does to keep anybody from knowing it.
translation.zh: 遭受家庭暴力的人通常都会这样做为了不让别人知道

translation.en: I got pregnant from that particular rape.
translation.zh: 就是那次被强奸 我怀孕了

translation.en: But you know, you can use the word "rape" in many ways
translation.zh: 但你知道 “强取豪夺”这个词可以用在很多场合

translation.en: because I feel like all of us has been raped of our life
translation.zh: 因为我感觉当任何人发生这种事情的时候

translation.en: when this incident happened to me.
translation.zh: 这些人的人生就被强制地夺走了

translation.en: You have to pack it back, and you have to hide it so you can go on living.
translation.zh: 你要把这件事掩盖下来 你要藏住这样才能继续活下去

translation.en: When you go through therapy, you have to close doors
translation.zh: 你去进行心理治疗的时候就是不停的关上这扇门

translation.en: and open doors and close doors.
translation.zh: 再打开 再关上

translation.en: These doors are never, never closed.
translation.zh: 然而这扇门永远都不会关上

translation.en: You never go on and say, "Oh, I'm all right. Life is very happy."
translation.zh: 一旦发生这种事 你永远都无法说出“我很好 人生非常幸福”

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不会的

translation.en: You carry it from then on.
translation.zh: 从发生的那刻起一辈子都是你的阴影

translation.en: And I don't know if there's enough love or enough support that will ever...
translation.zh: 我不知道是否有来自外界的足够的爱、足够的支持 去帮助…

translation.en: help Gina or Toia or many other girls.
translation.zh: 吉娜或者辛托娅帮助很多其他女孩走出去

translation.en: I don't think there's any hope of either three of us turning back...
translation.zh: 我想我们三个应该永远都没有机会去忘却…

translation.en: from the pain of what we've gone through.
translation.zh: 我们所经历的伤痛

translation.en: It's just something we're gonna have to live through one way or the other.
translation.zh: 不论我们怎样接受与消化这件事都要伴随我们终生

translation.en: [Mitchell] If my mama would have been that role model...
translation.zh: 如果我妈妈以前做了一个好榜样…

translation.en: there would be no Cyntoia Brown story.
translation.zh: …就不会有辛托娅·布朗的故事了

translation.en: I wouldn't be sitting here talking to y'all.
translation.zh: 我就不会坐在这里和你们所有人说话了

translation.en: Childhood abuse... molestation.
translation.zh: 童年遭到虐待… 性侵

translation.en: That's where a lot of hate for my mom formed around.
translation.zh: 我对我母亲的恨就是在那个时候形成的

translation.en: His name was Walter.
translation.zh: 他的名字叫沃尔特

translation.en: He was a relative of the neighbor.
translation.zh: 是邻居的一个亲戚

translation.en: He molested me from the time I was maybe six or seven up until I was ten.
translation.zh: 大概在我六、七岁开始他就一直对我进行性侵 一直到十岁

translation.en: And the places he took me was no different from here.
translation.zh: 他带我去的地方和这里没有什么区别

translation.en: I mean, there were woods.
translation.zh: 周围都是树林

translation.en: If we didn't go to the woods in his truck...
translation.zh: 如果不是坐他的卡车去树林…

translation.en: we were at his house.
translation.zh: 就是在他家

translation.en: I would just lay there frozen and relieved when it was over with.
translation.zh: 我就会躺在那里 一动不动等他结束的时候 我才能松一口气

translation.en: Then he would give me $20 and take me home.
translation.zh: 然后他会给我20美元 带我回家

translation.en: That's sex trafficking at its finest.
translation.zh: 这是性交易最好的体现

translation.en: I mean, when your own mother sends you out to be molested by a man
translation.zh: 你自己的亲生母亲把你送去被别的男人性侵

translation.en: after you've repeatedly... and begged her not--
translation.zh: 而且你还不停地央求她不要这样做…

translation.en: "I don't want to go. I don't want to go."
translation.zh: “我不想去”

translation.en: "You don't believe me? Do you hate me that much?
translation.zh: “你不相信我？你就那么恨我？

translation.en: Do you hate me that much that you allow somebody to do this?"
translation.zh: 你就那么恨我要允许别人这样对我？”

translation.en: You know, when you go through sexual abuse as a child,
translation.zh: 当你作为一个孩子被性虐待

translation.en: you go from being scared,
translation.zh: 会从最开始的恐惧

translation.en: you build hate.
translation.zh: 逐渐积累恨意

translation.en: It's sad.
translation.zh: 很悲哀

translation.en: No child should have to go through that.
translation.zh: 没有任何一个孩子应该经历这些

translation.en: No woman should have to go through that. No man should have to go through that.
translation.zh: 没有任何一个女人应该经历这些没有任何一个男人应该经历这些

translation.en: Is it fair?
translation.zh: 这公平吗？

translation.en: It's not fair at all.
translation.zh: 一点都不公平

translation.en: But that's the world that we live in.
translation.zh: 但这就是我们生活的世界

translation.en: [Cyntoia, over phone] I think more about how my actions and my behaviors affect other people.
translation.zh: 我现在会更多地去思考我的行动和行为 会怎样影响其他人

translation.en: I think the fact that I realized that
translation.zh: 我想 我意识到这一点

translation.en: is probably one of the biggest changes between me at 28 and me at 16.
translation.zh: 应该是我在16岁和28岁最大的一个区别

translation.en: I care more about how what I do affects other people.
translation.zh: 我现在更加在意我的所作所为 会怎样影响其他人

translation.en: I don't really deal with a lot of people in here
translation.zh: 我在里面不太会和那些

translation.en: who are doing stuff they have no business doing.
translation.zh: 做一些无聊事情的人接触

translation.en: Not only because that's just not who I want to be,
translation.zh: 不仅是因为 我不想成为那样的人

translation.en: but it's not the kind of stuff I want in my life.
translation.zh: 还因为 我不想人生中搅进那些乱事

translation.en: I go to college. I go to Lipscomb.
translation.zh: 我去读大学 我在利普斯康大学拿到了学位但我得到的 不止是一个学位

translation.en: I've got a degree from Lipscomb, but it's more than that.
translation.zh: 我在利普斯康大学拿到了学位但我得到的 不止是一个学位

translation.en: It's about maintaining positive, healthy relationships
translation.zh: 更重要的是和积极、健康的人

translation.en: with positive, healthy people.
translation.zh: 建立积极、健康的关系

translation.en: Life in prison, it's not a life.
translation.zh: 监狱中的人生 根本不是人生

translation.en: You have to kind of fight to carve out a life for yourself
translation.zh: 你要去拼命为自己打造出一个人生

translation.en: that has some kind of meaning, that has some kind of worth and some kind of value.
translation.zh: 这个人生要有一定的意义有它的意义 有它的价值

translation.en: I think that that's really at the heart of rehabilitation
translation.zh: 我想这才是监禁的真正意义

translation.en: when you have been forced to grow up in prison.
translation.zh: 被迫在监狱中成长

translation.en: And I think that is really what was... what was going on with me
translation.zh: 我想这才是我之所以变成这样我身上发生的这些变化

translation.en: and what was behind my change.
translation.zh: 背后的真正原因

translation.en: I don't want a life in prison. I want to have a life.
translation.zh: 我不想在监狱中度过一生我想要自己的人生

translation.en: Today, in 2017, Cyntoia Brown would be classified a sex slave,
translation.zh: （未成年不会再受到指控被判为妓女） 在今天 2017年辛托娅·布朗会被判定为性奴隶

translation.en: a little child manipulated who didn't stand a chance
translation.zh: 一个被人控制的小孩子 没有机会

translation.en: against the men who used her,
translation.zh: 去反抗利用她的男人

translation.en: but that wasn't the case in 2004.
translation.zh: 但在2004年 不是这样的

translation.en: Filmmaker Dan Birman shared video from his seven years
translation.zh: 电影制片人丹·波尔曼分享了他

translation.en: documenting Cyntoia Brown's case.
translation.zh: 对辛托娅·布朗案拍摄的七年纪录

translation.en: [Cyntoia, over phone] I want a second chance.
translation.zh: 我想要再有一个机会

translation.en: Cyntoia Brown. She's been in prison for more than a decade now,
translation.zh: 辛托娅·布朗目前已经在监狱中度过了十几年

translation.en: but her case is catching fire on social media, #FreeCyntoiaBrown,
translation.zh: 她的案子在社交媒体上突然火了起来“请释放辛托娅·布朗”这个话题标签

translation.en: after being shared on Instagram by pop superstar Rihanna.
translation.zh: 流行歌手巨星蕾哈娜在Instagram上分享了她的故事之后

translation.en: [Case] Now celebrities like Rihanna, T.I. and Lana Del Rey
translation.zh: 现在蕾哈娜、T.I.、拉娜·德雷这样的名人

translation.en: are tweeting for clemency for Cyntoia,
translation.zh: 都在发推特请求赦免辛托娅

translation.en: a sex-trafficked teen doing life in prison.
translation.zh: 这个在监狱中度日的被迫参与性交易的少女

translation.en: [Bone] #FreeCyntoiaBrown became such an amazing experience.
translation.zh: “请释放辛托娅·布朗”这个话题标签简直是不可思议的经历

translation.en: I guess there were a million tweets.
translation.zh: 这个话题标签下应该能发了上百万条推特

translation.en: The attention that Cyntoia's case has received
translation.zh: 辛托娅案受到的关注

translation.en: is an important worldwide event...
translation.zh: 是世界性的重要事件…

translation.en: that provides an avenue for consideration of children
translation.zh: 它提供了一个途径去为全球的儿童考虑

translation.en: across the world, not just in the United States,
translation.zh: 不仅限于美国内的儿童

translation.en: not just in Tennessee.
translation.zh: 不仅限于田纳西州的儿童

translation.en: Cyntoia made the decision that the timing was appropriate
translation.zh: 辛托娅做出决定 时机刚刚好

translation.en: to seek the help of the governor because we knew
translation.zh: 可以寻求州长的帮助 因为我们知道

translation.en: the governor was going into his last year in office.
translation.zh: 那是州长最后一年执政了

translation.en: Governor Haslam will have served eight years
translation.zh: 海斯勒姆州长即将在2019年1月

translation.en: in January of 2019.
translation.zh: 完成长达八年的执政

translation.en: Once all of your state appeals are over, you then have a final opportunity,
translation.zh: 当你们州所有的上诉都完成的时候会有一个最终的机会

translation.en: I guess you'd say in criminal law, to be heard.
translation.zh: 在刑法中 这叫“听证”的机会

translation.en: We filed the petition for clemency
translation.zh: 我们向保释委员会和州长

translation.en: with the Board of Parole and with the governor.
translation.zh: 提交了赦免辛托娅的请愿

translation.en: They don't do a lot of hearings on clemency.
translation.zh: 他们不会对很多赦免请求进行听证

translation.en: This was filed on behalf of Cyntoia on December the 19th, 2017.
translation.zh: 这是在2017年12月18日代表辛托娅提交的

translation.en: It starts interestingly with a letter from Cyntoia to the governor,
translation.zh: 很有趣的是它开始于辛托娅给州长的一封信

translation.en: why she thinks it's so appropriate for her to be honored with clemency from him.
translation.zh: 她为什么认为州长应该给她赦免

translation.en: And then what we do is go through her legal and procedural backgrounds.
translation.zh: 然后我们做的是检查她的法律和法律程序背景

translation.en: It starts, as a matter of fact,
translation.zh: 事实上 请愿开始于

translation.en: with the letter from the president of Lipscomb University, Randy Lowry,
translation.zh: 利普斯康大学校长兰迪·劳里写的信

translation.en: and speaks to her 4.0 grade point average.
translation.zh: 说她的平均绩点是4.0

translation.en: And then many letters from people in the community,
translation.zh: 接下来是她社区中很多人写的信

translation.en: from the mayor, from the juvenile judge, from advocacy groups
translation.zh: 市长的信、少年法庭法官的信辩护律师团的信

translation.en: who say, you know, she's the perfect person to be considered for... for clemency.
translation.zh: 信中都说她是最适合考虑被给予赦免的人

translation.en: Dr. Bernet, he said,
translation.zh: 博内特医生说

translation.en: "Recently, I was contacted by Ms. Brown's current attorney
translation.zh: “近期 我接到布朗女士当前律师的联系

translation.en: who requested my support in Ms. Brown's application for clemency."
translation.zh: 请求我在布兰女士申请赦免中予以支持”

translation.en: [Bernet] Thirteen years had elapsed between my meetings with Cyntoia.
translation.zh: 我和辛托娅当初的会面已经过去了13年

translation.en: I originally evaluated her when she was 16,
translation.zh: 我最开始是在她16岁对她进行了评估

translation.en: and then I saw her a few months ago when she was 29.
translation.zh: 然后我在几个月前在她29岁见到了她

translation.en: I think the most general description is that she had grown up,
translation.zh: 我想 对她最笼统的描述应该是她长大了

translation.en: both intellectually and socially.
translation.zh: 智能和社交方面 都长大了

translation.en: I think another general impression was that she had learned a lot.
translation.zh: 另一个笼统的印象是她学到了很多

translation.en: She had a broader understanding, I think, of life and society,
translation.zh: 她对人生和社会都有了更广阔的理解

translation.en: that she was studying interesting things in college.
translation.zh: 她在学校 学习了很多有趣的东西

translation.en: She herself had gotten interested in the problem of sexual trafficking.
translation.zh: 她本人也对性交易的问题非常有兴趣

translation.en: When I interviewed her, she was in the process of writing a term paper...
translation.zh: 我采访她的时候她正在写一个期末论文…

translation.en: on that topic.
translation.zh: 论文的主题就是性交易

translation.en: She managed to share through her own experience
translation.zh: 她在其中分享了自己的经历

translation.en: and through things she had read and studied on this topic.
translation.zh: 她在这个主题上阅读过的书籍和研究过的资料

translation.en: And she had a lot of really good ideas
translation.zh: 她有很多非常好的想法

translation.en: for how to use that knowledge outside of the prison.
translation.zh: 出狱后 怎样去应用这些知识

translation.en: [Gordon] Pardon and Parole Board...
translation.zh: 赦免与保释委员会…

translation.en: they've made the decision to hear Cyntoia on her request for commutation.
translation.zh: 已经决定对辛托娅减刑的请求进行听证

translation.en: The governor has the absolute constitutional right
translation.zh: 州长有宪法赋予的绝对权力

translation.en: to grant relief on commutation.
translation.zh: 批准减刑赦免

translation.en: But before he will take any action,
translation.zh: 在他做出任何行动之前

translation.en: he wants the opinion of the Pardon and Parole Board.
translation.zh: 需要听听赦免与保释委员会的意见

translation.en: And that's what we're going to do this next week.
translation.zh: 这是我们在接下来一周中需要做的事情

translation.en: The purpose of which is to show that Cyntoia Brown has been rehabilitated
translation.zh: 听审的目的是展示出辛托娅·布朗在被监禁后

translation.en: since her incarceration
translation.zh: 已经改过自新

translation.en: and that she can be a useful member of society
translation.zh: 她可以成为对社会有用的一员

translation.en: and, in all likelihood, will be if she receives a commuted sentence.
translation.zh: 并且她一旦获得减刑后极有可能成为对社会有用的一员

translation.en: In 2004, she was considered to be a prostitute
translation.zh: 在2004年 她被认为是一名妓女

translation.en: even though she was 16 years old.
translation.zh: 即便当时 她只有16岁

translation.en: That has changed.
translation.zh: 现在已经不同了

translation.en: If it happened today, she would not be considered a crime
translation.zh: 如果她的事情是在现在发生她不会被认为是罪犯

translation.en: but a victim of sexual predators.
translation.zh: 而是掠夺者的受害者

translation.en: We are requesting the Pardon and Parole Board
translation.zh: 我们请求赦免与保释委员会

translation.en: to recommend to the governor
translation.zh: 建议州长

translation.en: that he commute her sentence to second-degree murder.
translation.zh: 把她的判决减刑为二级谋杀

translation.en: If he does that, then that would make her eligible for parole.
translation.zh: 如果他能减为二级她就能申请保释了

translation.en: She will still have a criminal record.
translation.zh: 她还是会有犯罪记录

translation.en: She will still lose a lot of the rights that ordinary citizens have...
translation.zh: 她还是会失去很多普通公民拥有的权利…

translation.en: but she will have an opportunity
translation.zh: 但她将能有机会

translation.en: to live a useful and productive life outside of the prison system.
translation.zh: 在监狱体系外活出一个有用的、丰富的人生

translation.en: [man 1] Today is May the 23rd, 2018.
translation.zh: （关押13年零九个月） 今天是2018年5月23日

translation.en: We are conducting an executive clemency hearing at Tennessee Prison for Women.
translation.zh: 我们在田纳西女子监狱举行特别赦免听证

translation.en: This will be a commutation hearing for Cyntoia Denise Brown.
translation.zh: 这是辛托娅·蒂尼斯·布朗的减刑听证

translation.en: Tennessee Code annotated 40-28-125A
translation.zh: 田纳西备案码40-28-125A

translation.en: authorizes the board to advise and make recommendations to the governor
translation.zh: 授权委员会给州长提出意见和建议

translation.en: in respect to pardons,
translation.zh: 本案的赦免

translation.en: exonerations and commutations.
translation.zh: 无罪、和减刑相关决议

translation.en: The governor has said he will use his clemency powers very sparingly.
translation.zh: 州长表明他会谨慎使用自己的赦免权

translation.en: Ms. Brown, you will be permitted to speak and to present witnesses
translation.zh: 布朗女士 你将会被允许代表自己讲话

translation.en: on your behalf.
translation.zh: 并传唤证人

translation.en: At this time, I'd like to allow your counsel, Mr. Bone,
translation.zh: 这一次 我想允许你的律师伯恩先生

translation.en: to give an opening statement, and then, Ms. Brown,
translation.zh: 给一个开场陈述 然后布朗女士

translation.en: we would like to hear from you in your own words
translation.zh: 我们希望听到你用自己的语言描述

translation.en: about why you feel that you are rehabilitated
translation.zh: 为什么你认为 你已经改过自新

translation.en: and no longer a risk to safety of the public.
translation.zh: 不再对公众安全构成威胁

translation.en: So with that, Mr. Bone?
translation.zh: 那么 请伯恩先生开始？

translation.en: [Bone] This is a story of transformation
translation.zh: 这是一个荒废儿童的人生

translation.en: in the life of a wasted child who has become
translation.zh: 转变成美丽、智慧、关心他人

translation.en: a beautiful, intelligent, caring, educated woman
translation.zh: 受到教育的女人的故事

translation.en: who can make things better in this world, and that's why we're here.
translation.zh: 她可以让这个世界变得更好所以我们今天才会坐在这里

translation.en: [Cyntoia] I just wanted to say thank you, first.
translation.zh: 首先 我想先说声谢谢

translation.en: I know a lot of people get to see you, but I have prayed for a very long time...
translation.zh: 我知道很多人能有机会见到您但我已经祈祷了很久…

translation.en: to be able to meet with you.
translation.zh: 才终于能够见到您

translation.en: And I know it's purely an act of mercy that you even give me a hearing,
translation.zh: 我知道您愿意给我这次听证的机会是单纯地出于仁慈

translation.en: and that means everything to me.
translation.zh: 这对我来说意义重大

translation.en: What I did was horrible.
translation.zh: 我过去做过的事情很可怕

translation.en: I killed Johnny Allen, and he's gone. And it stayed with me this whole time.
translation.zh: 我杀害了乔尼·艾伦 他走了多年来 这件事一直让我耿耿于怀

translation.en: I was locked up at 16. It was like that was it.
translation.zh: 我在16岁被关押似乎人生就已成定局

translation.en: I have no choice but to live a different life,
translation.zh: 我没有办法选择去过一个不一样的人生

translation.en: and they've given me that opportunity.
translation.zh: 但他们给我了我那样一个机会

translation.en: They've given me that chance.
translation.zh: 他们给了我一个机会

translation.en: You know, I can't make up for what I did,
translation.zh: 我所犯下的罪行 无以弥补

translation.en: but they've given me a chance to do so much more.
translation.zh: 但他们却给了我一个机会让我可以做得更多

translation.en: Whatever you decide, I respect it, but...
translation.zh: 不论您做出何种决定 我都尊重但是…

translation.en: I do pray that you show me mercy and that you give me a second chance.
translation.zh: 我殷切地祈祷您可以对我网开一面再给我一次机会

translation.en: [man 2] In 2008, I was working as a prosecutor in the Tennessee Attorney General's Office,
translation.zh: 在2008年 我在田纳西检察长办公室做一名检察官

translation.en: and the case of Cyntoia Denise Brown was assigned to me.
translation.zh: 辛托娅·蒂尼斯·布朗的案子被指派给了我

translation.en: And so it was my job to represent the state in her appeal.
translation.zh: 所以我的职责就是在她的审判中代表本州

translation.en: I read every page of the trial transcript, and I examined every exhibit.
translation.zh: 我读了法庭案审记录的每一页检查了每一个物证

translation.en: And I argued that she needed to spend the rest of her life in prison.
translation.zh: 我当时认为她的余生都需要在监狱中度过

translation.en: Cyntoia, I met her in the spring of 2009.
translation.zh: 我在2009年的春天遇见辛托娅

translation.en: I just went blindly into the class not knowing who she was
translation.zh: 我当时是盲目地去上课没注意她是谁

translation.en: and didn't know who she was for weeks
translation.zh: 前几周 我都不知道她是谁

translation.en: until, one day, I got a court opinion in the mail.
translation.zh: 直到有一天我信箱中收到了法庭判决意见

translation.en: I open the envelope, see what it is,
translation.zh: 我打开信封 去查看是什么

translation.en: and there's Cyntoia's name on it, Cyntoia Denise Brown.
translation.zh: 在上面看到了辛托娅的名字辛托娅·蒂尼斯·布朗

translation.en: And that was the first time that I figured out
translation.zh: 那是我第一次发现

translation.en: the Cyntoia Denise Brown whose appeal I had worked on
translation.zh: 我之前处理的案子中那个辛托娅·蒂尼斯·布朗

translation.en: was the same Cyntoia Brown who was this luminous student in my class.
translation.zh: 就是我课堂中那个优秀的学生辛托娅·布朗

translation.en: She got her copy of the opinion the next day or a couple of days later.
translation.zh: 她是在后一天 或者几天之后拿到了这份法庭判决意见

translation.en: She came to class the following Wednesday night,
translation.zh: 她在下一周的周三晚上去了课堂

translation.en: and we briefly talked about it.
translation.zh: 我们简短地聊了聊她的案子

translation.en: I told her that I was sorry.
translation.zh: 我对她说 我很遗憾

translation.en: She said, "You were doing your job."
translation.zh: 她说：“你是在履行自己的职责”

translation.en: I could tell that she was hurt
translation.zh: 我能看出来 她很受伤

translation.en: because, on top of being disappointed that her appeal just got denied...
translation.zh: 因为她不仅要经历上诉被驳回的失望

translation.en: now she has to go through the rest of the semester
translation.zh: 现在又要和一个证明了“对 判51年监禁非常准确”的人

translation.en: with the guy who argued, "Yeah, 51 years is exactly right."
translation.zh: 现在又要和一个证明了“对 判51年监禁非常准确”的人 一起度过下半学期

translation.en: Justice is not just about saying,
translation.zh: 司法不只是去说

translation.en: "What crime was committed, and how much time does this person get."
translation.zh: “这个人犯了什么罪 获刑了多少年”

translation.en: And having cultivated some understanding about the context in which
translation.zh: 要去对案件发生时的背景进行一定的了解

translation.en: her crime occurred, but a lot of people's crimes occur,
translation.zh: 不只是她这个案件很多人的案件都是这样

translation.en: I think justice is more about trying to achieve the right outcome
translation.zh: 我想司法更重要的意义是试着产生最好的结果

translation.en: than it is about alleging rule violations.
translation.zh: 而不是宣称是否违背法律

translation.en: Time and proximity are funny things
translation.zh: 时间和对别人的亲近了解是有趣的东西

translation.en: because they can change adversaries into allies.
translation.zh: 因为它们可以把敌人变成盟友

translation.en: Here I am ten years later...
translation.zh: 十年后 我在这里…

translation.en: not arguing against her but arguing in favor of her release.
translation.zh: 不是做出对她不利的辩论而是为了帮助她释放而辩论

translation.en: And I do that because I have borne witness along with all these other folks
translation.zh: 我这样做 是因为我和很多人一样亲眼目睹了

translation.en: to the kind of person that Cyntoia is.
translation.zh: 辛托娅是一个怎样的人

translation.en: [Sinback] Ladies and gentlemen of the board, I am honored to come before you today
translation.zh: 委员会的各位成员我今天很荣幸地来到各位面前

translation.en: as Cyntoia Brown's juvenile court attorney and friend of 14 years.
translation.zh: 作为辛托娅·布朗的少年法庭律师和14年的朋友

translation.en: I would like to tell you only about the Cyntoia Brown of today,
translation.zh: 我真希望告诉各位的只有如今的辛托娅·布朗

translation.en: the remarkable woman you've been hearing so much about,
translation.zh: 这个各位多次听说的优秀的女人

translation.en: but I would be remiss if I did not also tell you
translation.zh: 但如果我只字不提过去的辛托娅那将是我的失职

translation.en: about the Cyntoia Brown I met on August 9th, 2004,
translation.zh: 我最初是在2004年8月9日遇见辛托娅

translation.en: three days after the horrible incident that caused her to be in here.
translation.zh: 是那起最终导致她在这里的可怕事故后的第三天

translation.en: When I represented Cyntoia when she was 16 at the transfer hearing,
translation.zh: 我在她16岁时代表她进行进行转移听审

translation.en: my goal was to really show who Cyntoia was.
translation.zh: 我的目标是真正地展示出辛托娅是一个什么样的人

translation.en: She had been through a lot of really hard things in her life.
translation.zh: 她这一生中 经历了很多艰难的事情

translation.en: What really brought it full circle for me
translation.zh: 真正把我带回这件事的是

translation.en: was when I became involved in the case again,
translation.zh: 当我再次涉入此案

translation.en: working with Cyntoia and working on her clemency.
translation.zh: 和辛托娅一起 研究她的赦免

translation.en: I realized that I was really using the same strategy
translation.zh: 我发现 我使用的策略真的是

translation.en: that I had used during the transfer hearing
translation.zh: 和上次在转移庭审中一模一样

translation.en: to really show that she's a person who can be in the community
translation.zh: 就是去真正地展示出她是一个可以融入社会的人

translation.en: and that she deserves to have a chance to live a life.
translation.zh: 她应该得到一个过自己人生的机会

translation.en: When I was a defense attorney,
translation.zh: 我在做她的辩护律师时

translation.en: it always was very interesting when people would ask me,
translation.zh: 我一直认为很有趣的一件事是人们总会问我

translation.en: "Why fight for someone like that?
translation.zh: “为什么为这种人努力争取？

translation.en: Why fight for a person who has taken a life?
translation.zh: 为什么为一个夺去别人生命的人努力争取？

translation.en: How can you defend that person who's guilty?
translation.zh: 你怎么能为了那个有罪的人辩护？

translation.en: What if they get out and do the same thing again?"
translation.zh: 万一他们出来再次犯下以前的罪行怎么办？“

translation.en: -Hi, guys. -[students] Hi.
translation.zh: 你们好

translation.en: -How you doing? Good to see you today. -[students] Good.
translation.zh: 你们怎么样？很高兴今天见到你们

translation.en: Um, so we've been talking about juvenile transfer and the situation that you all are in.
translation.zh: 我们之前一直在讲少年法庭的转移以及你们所有人都所处的情况

translation.en: Cyntoia's case fits into the issue of sentencing reform
translation.zh: 辛托娅的案子符合量刑的问题

translation.en: by showing us that children deserve a review,
translation.zh: 它向我们展示了儿童的案件应该进行审查

translation.en: not necessarily parole or release,
translation.zh: 不仅是能否保释或释放的问题

translation.en: but that all children deserve us to take a look at them
translation.zh: 还有所有儿童 都值得我们在多年后

translation.en: after a fair number of years.
translation.zh: 重新去看待他们

translation.en: The community is ready to welcome Cyntoia into its fold and to see her face-to-face,
translation.zh: 社区已经准备好迎接辛托娅进入与她面对面相处

translation.en: not as the child she was in 2004,
translation.zh: 不再把她当作2004年的那个孩子

translation.en: but as the incredible, incredible woman that she has become.
translation.zh: 而是当作她如今变成的这个优秀的女人

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Montgomery] What I would like to do now is go to the victim's side.
translation.zh: 我现在想要做的是 听听被害的一方

translation.en: Just tell me your name, if you would please,
translation.zh: 如果你愿意 请告诉我你的名字

translation.en: and make any comment you'd like to make.
translation.zh: 你想说什么 都可以畅所欲言

translation.en: [woman 1] My name is Anna Whaley.
translation.zh: 我的名字叫安娜·伟丽

translation.en: I'm a close personal friend of Johnny
translation.zh: 我是乔尼·艾伦私底下的好朋友

translation.en: and his family.
translation.zh: 情同手足

translation.en: Johnny has a voice, and Johnny's family has a voice.
translation.zh: （安娜·伟丽 乔尼·艾伦的朋友） 乔尼的声音应该被听到乔尼家人的声音也应该被听到

translation.en: It's not been heard in all these years, but today I am that voice.
translation.zh: 然而过去几十年 一直没有人聆听今天 我要代表这个声音

translation.en: Cyntoia has done great harm...
translation.zh: 辛托娅做出了非常巨大的伤害…

translation.en: and Johnny did not deserve to die.
translation.zh: 乔尼并不该死

translation.en: I hope...
translation.zh: 我希望

translation.en: I hope sincerely God has transformed her life.
translation.zh: 我真心地希望 上帝已经让她转变了

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: 我真心希望如此

translation.en: Johnny's life mattered.
translation.zh: 乔尼的生命很重要

translation.en: Johnny was loved, and he is missed dearly. And this is a very sad story.
translation.zh: 乔尼被深切地爱着、思念着这是一个非常悲伤的故事

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Montgomery] I am ready to vote.
translation.zh: 我已经准备好投票了

translation.en: I'm going to agree to the commutation of second-degree murder.
translation.zh: 我会同意减刑到二级谋杀

translation.en: [woman 2] My recommendation to the governor will be
translation.zh: 我对州长的建议是

translation.en: to recommend changing Defendant Brown's parole eligibility date
translation.zh: 建议改变被告布朗的申请保释期限

translation.en: to August of 2029, in other words, after serving 25 years.
translation.zh: 改到2029年8月 也就是服刑25年

translation.en: My recommendation to the governor will be to decline your application.
translation.zh: 我给州长的建议是 拒绝你的申请

translation.en: [Montgomery] So you have heard all of the different recommendations
translation.zh: 各位已经听到了委员会不同成员即将给州长的

translation.en: that will be going to the governor.
translation.zh: 不同建议

translation.en: We will do a report. He will decide what he will do.
translation.zh: 我们会给出一个报告让州长决定怎样做

translation.en: As we said earlier, this is a recommendation to him.
translation.zh: 正如我们之前所说 这是给他的建议

translation.en: -He makes the final decision. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -最终由州长给出决定-谢谢

translation.en: [Bone] We end up with a divided group in terms of the decision that they made.
translation.zh: 委员会最终做出的决定意见是分歧的

translation.en: Two who thought to lower the sentence from first-degree to second-degree
translation.zh: 两个人认为应该从一级谋杀降为二级谋杀

translation.en: and two who thought her term should be lowered to 25 years.
translation.zh: 两个人认为应该减刑至25年

translation.en: And then two who thought there should be no relief.
translation.zh: 还有两个人认为 不应该减刑

translation.en: We don't know.
translation.zh: 我们不知道

translation.en: So we'll see what the governor says.
translation.zh: 所以就看州长怎么说吧

translation.en: [Brown] How things have changed for me the last 14 years?
translation.zh: 我在过去14年人生发生了怎样的变化？

translation.en: There has been times that, you know, I really wanted to give up.
translation.zh: 有些时候 我也曾认真地想过放弃

translation.en: I allowed myself to get in that place of despair.
translation.zh: 我放任自己进入绝望之地

translation.en: But through it all, I feel that I have persevered
translation.zh: 但我能够自始至终坚持下来

translation.en: because the one constant
translation.zh: 是因为辛托娅人生中的

translation.en: that has always been in Cyntoia's life has been me.
translation.zh: 一个一直不变的永恒存在 是我

translation.en: And I know, if I allow myself to fall apart,
translation.zh: 我知道 如果我都放任自己崩溃

translation.en: then who does she have?
translation.zh: 那她还有谁？

translation.en: Where are her hopes and where are her dreams?
translation.zh: 她的希望、她的梦想还会在哪里？

translation.en: The emotional roller coaster that I've been on is...
translation.zh: 我经历过的情感过山车…

translation.en: like nothing that you ever experienced.
translation.zh: 是你们的经历永远都无法匹敌的

translation.en: Because, at this point now, I don't allow myself to hope.
translation.zh: 因为在目前这个时候我不允许自己抱有期望

translation.en: I want to and I do hope that, in the end, everything is gonna be
translation.zh: 我想要希望 我也真心希望最后一切都会

translation.en: the way I pray for it to be, and that's to have her home.
translation.zh: 是我祈祷的样子 我们能让她回家

translation.en: And I'm thinking...
translation.zh: 万一我想…

translation.en: ...it's gonna happen this time.
translation.zh: “这一次 会实现的

translation.en: It's gonna happen.
translation.zh: 会实现的”

translation.en: And then it doesn't happen.
translation.zh: 结果却并没有实现

translation.en: Going to see Cyntoia is... [laughs] ...pretty routine for me.
translation.zh: 去看辛托娅是我的日常

translation.en: I think the biggest change that I've seen in... in Toia
translation.zh: 我想我从开车走这条路去看她以来

translation.en: since I've been making this drive down here is...
translation.zh: 看到托娅最大的改变是…

translation.en: She's more open.
translation.zh: 她更加敞开心扉了

translation.en: You know, for a very long time, she couldn't really
translation.zh: 你知道 她长久以来一直无法真正地

translation.en: or didn't really express truly how she felt about things.
translation.zh: 或者说没有真正地去表达自己对事物的真实想法

translation.en: We still don't know the outcome, but now we can honestly say there is hope.
translation.zh: 我们还不知道结果如何但现在我们可以诚实地说 有希望

translation.en: People know what has happened in this state, and people are watching.
translation.zh: 这个州的人们知道发生过什么人们都在看

translation.en: If he says yes, Toia can walk out a free woman.
translation.zh: 如果州长同意托娅就可以出狱 做一个自由的女人

translation.en: It's gonna hurt us all if he says no.
translation.zh: 如果州长不同意我们所有人都会伤心

translation.en: We're leaving the office now.
translation.zh: 我们正要离开办公室

translation.en: We're going to try to communicate to Cyntoia
translation.zh: 我们会试着去和辛托娅沟通

translation.en: the decision that the governor has made.
translation.zh: 州长做出的决定

translation.en: [woman, over phone] Do you know what building we're going in?
translation.zh: 你知道我们要去什么楼吗？

translation.en: Yeah, we're going in where we've always gone in.
translation.zh: 知道 我们要去那个 经常去的楼

translation.en: [Sinback, over phone] The visitation building?
translation.zh: 访问楼？

translation.en: [Bone] The governor's lawyer, Dwight Tarwater, called
translation.zh: 州长的律师杜怀特·达沃特打电话来说

translation.en: and said, "We want y'all to come meet with us tomorrow morning,
translation.zh: “我想让你们明天早上都过来见我们”

translation.en: but you can't tell anybody.
translation.zh: 但你们不能告诉任何人

translation.en: This is a strictly private meeting."
translation.zh: 这是一个严格的私人会议”

translation.en: We went in to see Dwight,
translation.zh: 我们进去见杜怀特

translation.en: and he says, "Hold on a minute. Let me go see if the governor's ready."
translation.zh: 他说：“稍等我看看州长有没有准备好”

translation.en: We didn't have any idea we were gonna meet with the governor.
translation.zh: 我们并不知道 是要见州长

translation.en: Can you imagine holding your breath for minutes while you're waiting?
translation.zh: 你能想象 在等待的几分钟内一直屏住呼吸吗？

translation.en: And the governor said, "I want to tell you what we're gonna do."
translation.zh: 州长说：‘我想告诉你们我们打算怎样做’

translation.en: The governor is gonna commute her sentence to 15 years.
translation.zh: 州长会给她减刑到15年

translation.en: And that'll end in August.
translation.zh: 今年八月就会结束

translation.en: She's gonna move to the transition group for the next seven months,
translation.zh: 在接下来七个月中她会被转移到出狱过渡组

translation.en: and she's gonna be on probation for ten years.
translation.zh: 十年缓刑观察

translation.en: We walked in. I got the first hug, and I said,
translation.zh: 我们走了进去我第一个拥抱了她 我说

translation.en: "You're getting out in August," because I wanted it to just be.
translation.zh: “你八月就出去了”因为我就想这样简单直白

translation.en: -You know, I didn't want any suspense. -[line ringing]
translation.zh: 我不想给她制造悬疑、惊喜什么的

translation.en: So, you know, she started dancing.
translation.zh: 然后她就开始手舞足蹈

translation.en: She just couldn't have been more excited, and it was just perfect, just perfect.
translation.zh: 她从来都没那么激动过真是太完美了

translation.en: So she's really, really happy, so--
translation.zh: 她真的很开心

translation.en: -[woman, over phone] Did she cry? -Did she cry?
translation.zh: 她哭了吗？ -她哭了吗？哭了 所有人都哭了-对

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Eckerman] Yeah. -Yeah. Yeah, everybody cried. -[Eckerman] Oh! [gasps]
translation.zh: -她哭了吗？哭了 所有人都哭了-对

translation.en: -Oh, hallelujah! -Yeah, yeah, yeah.
translation.zh: -万岁！-是啊

translation.en: I told her also to try to call a little after 11:00,
translation.zh: 我告诉她11:00过一点的时候适合打个电话

translation.en: and we might even be able to put her on the speakerphone someplace.
translation.zh: 我可能一起去一个地方 打开免提

translation.en: You ready? Okay. I'm gonna put you on speakerphone, okay?
translation.zh: 你准备好了吗？我要开免提了 好吗？

translation.en: We have a really large group, and... but we wanted you to be able to say hello
translation.zh: 我们这里有一大群人我们想让你能跟这些人问好

translation.en: and thank you to the people who are here
translation.zh: 感谢在这里的每一个人

translation.en: and the people who've been praying for you all these years
translation.zh: 感谢这些年一直为你祈祷的人们

translation.en: -and so interested in your life. -[Cyntoia, over phone] Yes.
translation.zh: -对你的人生表示关心的人-好

translation.en: [Bone] I'm not gonna try to tell you the people who are here,
translation.zh: 我不会去告诉你 现在这里都有谁

translation.en: but you can guess.
translation.zh: 不过你可以去猜

translation.en: [Cyntoia] Oh, I love y'all.
translation.zh: 我爱你们

translation.en: -[woman] We love you! -We love you too.
translation.zh: -我们爱你-我们也爱你

translation.en: [Cyntoia] You said, as soon as I come to God,
translation.zh: 你们说过 只要我心向上帝

translation.en: that He was gonna release me. You said it.
translation.zh: 他就会释放我 你们说到做到了

translation.en: It is the culmination of 15 years
translation.zh: 这是历经15年后的高潮

translation.en: of hard work and tears and anguish and joy.
translation.zh: 一切的努力、眼泪、痛苦、喜悦

translation.en: She has everything that she needs, you know, to be successful.
translation.zh: 她拥有成功所需的一切特质

translation.en: How she uses it...
translation.zh: 她会怎样利用这些特质…

translation.en: will be basically up to her.
translation.zh: 就要看她自己了

translation.en: Where the roads lead, I don't know, but you know what?
translation.zh: 她的人生之路会走向何方 我不知道但你知道吗？

translation.en: I hope they lead to a rainbow for her.
translation.zh: 我希望她的人生之路可以走向彩虹

translation.en: [Cyntoia] I have come such a long way. It's been a very long time.
translation.zh: 这一路走来 艰难又漫长经历了这么多年

translation.en: When I was 16, I did a horrible thing.
translation.zh: 我16岁的时候 做了一件可怕的事情

translation.en: And I have carried that with me this whole time.
translation.zh: 这么多年 这件事情一直伴随着我

translation.en: I understand the things that I've done.
translation.zh: 我明白自己做了什么事情

translation.en: That it was so necessary to change.
translation.zh: 真的太需要改变了

translation.en: Everybody who's been here for me,
translation.zh: 所有支持过我的人们

translation.en: I would not be here if it weren't for them.
translation.zh: 如果不是他们 我坚持不到今天

translation.en: Through everything that's been shown today,
translation.zh: 经过今天给大家展示的一切

translation.en: I'm not gonna let you down.
translation.zh: 我不会让所有人失望

translation.en: I have a whole new family, a whole new community
translation.zh: 我有了一个全新的家庭全新的社区群体

translation.en: of people who love me, who believe in me, who support me.
translation.zh: 在这个群体中人们爱我、相信我、支持我

translation.en: There's so many things that I understand now that I didn't know.
translation.zh: 现在我懂得了很多以前不明白的事

translation.en: There's so many young people that still don't know,
translation.zh: 还有很多年轻人并不懂

translation.en: and I feel called to share that.
translation.zh: 我感觉分享这些 是我的使命

translation.en: I don't take that lightly.
translation.zh: 出狱后 我并没有掉以轻心

translation.en: And I can assure you that I will not let you down.
translation.zh: 我可以向所有人保证我不会让大家失望

translation.en: I promise.
translation.zh: 我保证
